10 twisted band working into the ridge made from row 39 with the 3rd loop only we ll work a two color border join color b and chain 3 remove hook and join color c in the next st ch3 see pictures remove hook and go back to color b moving color c chain to back single_crochet in next st with color b and chain 2 continue to bring the new color between the loop and chain of previous color ad single_crochet ch2 until you ve reached the end of the hdc3lp around your hat -
